title: Fasting is a Protection from Sin and Hell - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: the prophet said in s bukari Vol number three in the book of fasting Hadith number 1894 that fasting is a shield the similar message is repeated in s bukari volume 3 book of fasting Hadith number 1904 the prophet said fasting is a shield it will protect you from the Hellfire and prevent you from doing sins the reason a beloved Prophet mallalli wasallam said this is because that when a person eats and when his stomach is full that the time he can think of doing other Deeds many of which may be Haram which may be wrong but once a person is hungry he doesn't think of these Haram things only when the tummy is full can you think of doing something imagine if you're hungry if you're really very hungry you not think of going to a movie when you're really hungry you don't think of listening to music so that's the reason when a person is hungry it prevents him from doing the sins that is Prophet said that it is like a shield
